channel.title: MTP Server Question
channel.description: Alright so ive never done a rs2 server, but im very familiar with rsc servers, ive been away for about 2 years now though so maybe im just rusty and need a quick freshen up on a few things. I have experimented with some servers and never had a problem setting my connections, but i recently downloaded this mtp v2 server and I can't for the life of me find the damn server side connection, i have looked everywhere and I can't find it, anyone familiar with it?

item.title: MTP Server Question
item.dc:creator: @II_ZyZeX_II II ZyZeX II
item.description:
@II_ZyZeX_II wrote:

Not totally sure but what i would think to do… remember Ive never done rs2, just rsc, but i would start at shopassitant.java, edit your shop npc there, and then wouldnt you add your npc to npchandler.java then place him on ur server?

wait rs2 doesnt have npchandler, looks like its just npc.java?

Read full topic

item.title: MTP Server Question
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“II ZyZeX II, post:3, topic:363670”]Yea ive kinda noticed, but the code is there somewhere or i couldnt log on from localhost[/quote] tell me if you find how to change and message me, because I’ve been trying to get my mopar to have shops for nondonators with like claws, ags, sgs, bgs, ss, and bandos and no one is telling me how… So give me a heads up if you find how to add that stuff.

Read full topic
